ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Akebono RDM digital binary e, H+, He++ count rates
ResourceHeader.Description: These count rate data from the High Energy Particle Monitor (HPM) of the Radiation Monitor (RDM) reside in the DARTS/Akebono binary Science DataBase (SDB). They consist of count rates at 8-sec spacecraft spin resolution for 0.3-0.95, 0.95-2.5 and >2.5 MeV electrons, 6.3-15, 15-29, 29-62 MeV protons, and 16-52 MeV alpha particles. Detailed information is found at https://www.darts.isas.jaxa.jp/akbn/readme/readme.rdm.txt.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: In any publications, the use of the Akebono data should be acknowledged, for example, as "Akebono RDM/HPM data were provided by Akira S. Yukimatu through DARTS at Institute of Space and Astronautical Science, JAXA in Japan."

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: In any publications, the use of the Akebono data should be acknowledged, for example, as "Akebono LEP data were provided by Akira S. Yukimatu through DARTS at Institute of Space and Astronautical Science, JAXA in Japan."
